p: Lime oil contains trace amounts of 5‐MOP and methoxycoumarins, mainly citropten and 5‐geranyloxy‐7‐methoxycoumarin. The ADME of 5‐MOP has been addressed in Section 3.2.2.1. In the absence of specific data on the ADME of methoxyoxycoumarins, it is assumed that the same metabolic pathways described for furocoumarins also apply to citropten and 5‐geranyloxy‐7‐methoxycoumarin (see Section 3.2.2.1).
